subjectArea.name: PPM - Project Forecasts
subjectArea.description: This is a detailed subject area that provides the ability to report on cost, revenue, margin and the changes of Forecasts including tracking original, current and other versions across projects, tasks, organizations, resources, periods and associated hierarchies at line level.
subjectArea.implicitFactColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Forecast.Actual Raw Cost in Analytics Currency(without filter on PRIMARY_COST_FORECAST_FLAG)
